Title: Sammy's Adventures: The Secret

Rating: Suitable for all audiences 


Synopsis: 
Sammy was born with his brothers on a beautiful beach and faces the struggle for survival, to grow into an adult turtle and thus, at maturity, returning to the beach where he was born to play. It is not easy, he says only one in a thousand is successful, and Sammy is even worse, since the birth of their size is almost half of her siblings. 

Sammy spends the first ten years of his life at sea, drifting and carried away by the currents in the company of his friend Ray. One day has a mishap with some fishermen, being picked up by a child in care for several months, became the pet of a hippy commune which lies on a beautiful beach California. After a while decided to resume his journey, living endless adventures with great travel companions as a funny octopus, seahorses, fish, etc. 

The search for a companion you will face new situations, but in spite of oil spills and other complications will reach its goal, reaching the beach where he was born, after touring the world, and usher in a new generation ..
